channel.title: Barran Dodger Legal & Ethical Trust Fund - Case Updates
channel.description: Updates on blockchain-verified evidence archive, legal proceedings, and whistleblower protection advocacy. 240+ forensic documents with AI-verified significance statements.

item.title: Legal Status Tracker Now Live
item.description: Track the status of submissions to the International Criminal Court, UNHCR, Federal Court of Australia, and Office of the Australian Information Commissioner. Real-time progress updates on ongoing legal proceedings.

item.title: Interactive 35-Year Timeline Published
item.description: Explore the complete chronological documentation of persecution events from 1989 to present. Color-coded categories include government actions, legal proceedings, critical events, and spiritual milestones.

item.title: Evidence Archive Expanded to 240+ Blockchain-Verified Documents
item.description: The blockchain-verified evidence archive now contains over 240 forensic documents including Federal Court certifications, tribunal records, UNHCR/ICC submissions, clinical NDIS reports, theological analyses, and AI-analyzed testimonials spanning 35 years.

item.title: Taxpayer Cost Analysis: $11.5M+ in Government Persecution Costs
item.description: AI-powered impartial financial analysis reveals $11.5M+ in taxpayer costs funding the systematic persecution of one whistleblower across 35+ Australian government agencies. Includes agency-by-agency cost breakdown and timeline of expenditure.

item.title: UNHCR/ICC Evidence Package and New Document Imports
item.description: 13 new flagship documents imported including UNHCR/ICC Evidence Package, Systemic Endangerment Dossier, Integrated Testimonial Indictment, clinical NDIS reports naming perpetrators, theological analysis, and accountability instruments.

item.title: Press & Media Resources Available
item.description: Journalists and researchers can now access press kits, media contact information, and pre-approved statements for coverage of the Barran Dodger case.
